mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kl_product_img(kpi_name, kpi_path, kpi_uri, kpi_size, kpi_prod_seq) VALUES (#{kpi_name}, #{kpi_path}, #{kpi_uri}, #{kpi_size}, #{kpi_prod_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kl_product_img WHERE kpi_uri = #{uri} ORDER BY kpi_seq DESC LIMIT 1
